parameters: <Minimap:person0>
Minimap hide
ImageManager.preloadEventImg(this);
1.演者の初期配置
2.演出開始

Great Widow: Oh my, you're such a tomboy... I'm glad you
came.
this.setWaitMode('route');
Adventurer Emoni: Please stop with those jokes...!

Great Widow: Starting today, Agonia has officially become
the new Guild Master of the Adventurer's Guild. Please take
care of the new guild, Ftera.

Great Widow: Emoni... You should also fight for the weak.
This is something that should never change, no matter who
becomes the guild master.

Great Widow: For that reason, use the strength that I have
trained you with until today not for yourself, but for the
sake of others.

Adventurer Emoni: I promise... so please take some time to
rest.

Adventurer Emoni: I still haven't been able to repay the
favor of saving me... yet...

Great Widow: The wings of the Adventurer's Guild, Ftera, are
a symbol of freedom. Those wings exist on the backs of
everyone...

Great Widow: Of course, on Emoni's back as well... Soar
freely with your magnificent pure white wings.

The greatest fortune for Emoni was being able to meet the
Great Widow. The greatest misfortune was the Great Widow
passing away before she could learn everything.

Agonia, who newly assumed the position of guild master, was
also a problem. Agonia began to reform the organization for
the sake of her promise with the Great Widow. This was
perceived by Emoni as a disrespect towards her benefactor.

In fact, those who were dissatisfied with Agonia's reforms
left the guild. At the same time, Agonia's active
involvement in the Second Tarasa War and the intensification
of the Exchange of Lives also accelerated the rate of
resignations.

There were few who were willing to risk their lives for the
sake of the guild's freedom. Emoni was one of them. She
couldn't imagine herself standing on a bloody battlefield,
fighting against thugs and thieves, which was different from
the battles she had experienced before.

Emoni, as a rear support, began to make contact with the
nobles. At this time, her recklessness that had been dormant
in her started to show again. She began to act not for the
sake of the guild, but eventually for her own sake.

However, it is difficult to simply blame her for this
behavior. Emoni had lost the great widow, who had been her
compass, and she was lost within the organization that was
undergoing dramatic changes.

Emoni tried to establish contact with the nobles in order to
raise her reputation within the guild and secure a
commitment to send a mercenary group to the battlefield.
However, it turned out to be a trap set by the nobles who
wanted to eliminate the guild.

Emoni's reckless actions, although avoided by Stolge who had
conducted prior investigation, brought danger to the entire
guild.

After the end of the Second Tarasa War, Emoni was ordered to
resign from the guild. Emoni asked Agonia for the reason
behind the order and requested its withdrawal. Agonia simply
called it reckless and refused to acknowledge it.
Emoni once again lost her place.
イベント終了用
dobby_dispchara clear
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置
